title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Project-Based Integration of Generative AI for Teacher Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand the educational application principles of generative AI tools and integrate them into language learning design
Learners can develop and implement AI-based language education projects using evidence-based instructional design frameworks
Learners can identify ethical issues that may arise when using generative AI and propose response strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
